overview: Todd Maurer helps clients build, acquire and scale businesses in emerging markets, with a particular focus on Asia. He is currently Managing Director of Sinica Advisors LLC; a Board Director at STEM Academy; and an Advisor at China Education Network, Inc. He was previously VP of Corporate Development at Apollo Global, Inc, a joint venture between Apollo Group and the Carlyle Group, with responsibility for acquisitions and education investments in China and Asia. Maurer’s professional interests include international education start-ups and applications in educational media and technology.

milestones.description: Re-launched a corporate advisory firm focused on emerging markets.
Joined the STEM Academy as Board Director
Joined China Education Network, Inc as Advisor
